sourcesContent:
import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TranslateModule } from '@ngx-translate/core'; import { SwiperModule } from 'swiper/angular'; import SwiperCore, { SwiperOptions, Navigation, Pagination, Scrollbar, A11y } from 'swiper'; SwiperCore.use([Navigation, Pagination, Scrollbar, A11y]); @Component({ selector: 'app-about-us', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, TranslateModule, SwiperModule], templateUrl: './about-us.component.html', styleUrl: './about-us.component.scss' }) export class AboutUsComponent { config: SwiperOptions = { slidesPerView: 1, spaceBetween: 0, navigation: true, pagination: { clickable: true }, scrollbar: { draggable: true }, }; onSwiper(swiper) { console.log(swiper); swiper.activeIndex = 3 } onSlideChange(swiper) { console.log(swiper.activeIndex); } }
{{ "about.title" | translate }}
